system.sustained: Psyker makes Opposed Willpower Test vs all Daemonic creatures and Psykers/Warp Sorcerers within range. If Psyker suceeds against daemon, they take Psy Rating damage that ignores armour per Degree of Success. If Psyker Succeeds against Psyker/Warp Sorcerer, they have -10 per Degree of Success to any test made to try and manifest psychic powers.
